title: ManagerAccount.0.94.0
description: This schema defines a user account to be used in conjunction with a manager.  This will affect the Redfish service connection if this manager is responsible for the Redfish service.
specification: This resource shall be used to represent resources that represent the user accounts for the manager.

Password.description: This property is used with a PATCH or PUT to write the password for the account.  This property is null on a GET.
Password.specification: The value of this property shall be the password for this account.  The value shall be null for GET requests.

UserName.description: This property contains the user name for the account.
UserName.specification: The value of this property shall be the user name for this account.

self.description: This property shall contain the href to this resource.

links.description: The links array contains the links to other resources that are related to this resource.
